name: part_003
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】hololive 3rd Generation Live#きゅるるん大作戦〜最強アイドル、推すしかないでしょ〜【DAY1】 [cgvMVU2sO_U]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Commercial for JOYSOUND's "Do Anime Sengen!" featuring an anime character expressing her love for anime songs.
Advertisement for Hololive 3rd Generation merchandise prizes, including plushies and mouse pads, available at amusement facilities.
Commercial for Yoshinoya beef bowls, showing a person enjoying the food.
Bandai Gashapon advertisement featuring Hololive 3rd Generation mini CD collections and rubber straps.
A long montage showcasing a collection of handwritten messages and fan art from fans cheering for the Hololive 3rd Generation Live event.

subtitles.original: アニメにハマって 歌いたくなっちゃった
subtitles.english: I got hooked on anime and felt like singing!

subtitles.original: 推しのシーン見ながらカラオケ歌えるなんて...
subtitles.english: Being able to sing karaoke while watching my favorite scenes...

subtitles.original: 尊すぎてツライッ！
subtitles.english: It's so precious, it hurts!

subtitles.original: 歌いたいアニメ・ゲームソング見つけよう！
subtitles.english: Let's find the anime and game songs you want to sing!

subtitles.original: JOYSOUND
subtitles.english: JOYSOUND

subtitles.original: 全国のアミューズメント施設にて ホロライブ3期生 プライズ順次展開中！
subtitles.english: Hololive 3rd Gen prizes are now rolling out at amusement facilities nationwide!

subtitles.original: 吉野家でごはんにしよ♪
subtitles.english: Let's have a meal at Yoshinoya♪

subtitles.original: ぎゅう
subtitles.english: Beef

subtitles.original: ぎゅうぎゅう
subtitles.english: Beef, beef

subtitles.original: ぎゅぅ〜
subtitles.english: Beeeef~

subtitles.original: うま！
subtitles.english: Delicious!

subtitles.original: 元祖の本気、召し上がれ。
subtitles.english: Taste the seriousness of the original.

subtitles.original: 牛丼は吉野家
subtitles.english: For beef bowls, it's Yoshinoya.

subtitles.original: やっぱこれだね
subtitles.english: It's got to be this.

subtitles.original: ホロライブ3期生 ミニCDコレクション
subtitles.english: Hololive 3rd Gen Mini CD Collection

subtitles.original: ホロライブ3期生 つながるあにまるらばすと
subtitles.english: Hololive 3rd Gen Connecting Animal Rubber Straps

subtitles.original: きゅるるん大作戦〜最強アイドル、推すしかないでしょ〜
subtitles.english: Operation Kyururun ~The strongest idols, you just have to support them~

subtitles.original: 3期生ライブ開催おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Congratulations on the 3rd Generation Live!

subtitles.original: 全力で楽しんで！最高の思い出にしよう！
subtitles.english: Enjoy it with all your might! Let's make it the best memory!

subtitles.original: マリン船長大好き！応援してるよ！
subtitles.english: I love Captain Marine! I'm cheering for you!
